trans-unit.source: Provides methods that perform various type conversions.
trans-unit.target: 提供执行各种类型转换的方法。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
The type to which to convert the object.
An object of the specified target type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的目标类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将对象转换为指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
The type to which to convert the object.
An object of the specified target type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的目标类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.Char> value to a string, given a byte count.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref:System.Char>值为一个字符串，给定字节数时。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref> value to convert.
The byte count of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 字节数<xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.Char> array to a string.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref> array to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""> </xref>要转换的数组。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 指定数组的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts a subset of a <xref:System.Char> array to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将的子集转换<xref:System.Char>为字符串的数组。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref> array to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""> </xref>要转换的数组。

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index of the start position.
trans-unit.target: 起始位置的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Length of the subset in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 以字节为单位的子集的长度。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the specified array from the start position to the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 为指定长度的开始位置从指定数组的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts an object to a <xref:System.Boolean> value.
The object to convert.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value.
Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> if the object is null; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>的对象是否为 null; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts a string to a <xref:System.Boolean> value.
The string to convert.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value.
Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref> if the string is null; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>如果字符串为空; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 一维<xref uid="langword_csharp_Char" name="Char" href=""></xref>数组。
